title: Ben Stiller on Creating ‘Escape at Dannemora’ | The Watch (Ep. 308)
description:
The adaptation of John le Carré’s ‘Little Drummer Girl’ premieres this week on AMC (1:18). ‘Escape at Dannemora’ executive producer Ben Stiller talks about how he got involved with the project (25:32); working with Patricia Arquette, Benicio Del Toro, and Paul Dano (35:16); and his inspirations for the show (45:51).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Ben Stiller
Read Alison Herman’s review of ‘Escape at Dannemora’ here.
